HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2-3 radna dana, osim dostave za otoke i rijetko naseljena područja gdje može potrajati i duže.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava za otoke i rijetko naseljena područja može potrajati i duže.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2-3 radna dana, osim dostave za otoke i rijetko naseljena područja gdje može potrajati i duže.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava za otoke i rijetko naseljena područja može potrajati i duže.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery within Croatia for both standard and bulky items. In-store pickup, parcel shop, and parcel locker delivery are not mentioned as available options for online orders.
PROVIDERS: The exclusive delivery partner is Intereuropa d.o.o.
PRICING: Delivery is free for orders over €70. For orders below this threshold, a tiered pricing structure based on weight applies, starting from €6.00 for packages up to 2 kg and going up to €70.00 for packages up to 200 kg.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery time is 2-3 business days. Deliveries to Croatian islands and sparsely populated areas may take longer, though no specific surcharge for islands is mentioned. Delivery is restricted to the Republic of Croatia.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery (COD) is available for a surcharge of €1. Express and weekend delivery services are not offered.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Dostava i plaćanje' page. The pricing structure is detailed and easy to understand. However, the page lacks information on alternative delivery methods like in-store pickup or parcel points, and does not provide details on express or weekend delivery options.
